    public ClassPathXmlApplicationContext(String fileName) {

    private void readXml(String fileName) {
        SAXReader saxReader = new SAXReader();
        try {
            URL xmlPath =
this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource(fileName);
            Document document = saxReader.read(xmlPath);
            Element rootElement = document.getRootElement();
            //å¯¹é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸€ä¸ª<bean>ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†
            for (Element element : (List<Element>) rootElement.elements()) {

                String beanClassName = element.attributeValue("class");

beanClassName);

                beanDefinitions.add(beanDefinition);

    }
    //åˆ©ç”¨åå°„åˆ›å»ºBeanå®ä¾‹ï¼Œå¹¶å­˜å‚¨åœ¨singletonsä¸­
    private void instanceBeans() {
        for (BeanDefinition beanDefinition : beanDefinitions) {
            try {
                singletons.put(beanDefinition.getId(),
Class.forName(beanDefinition.getClassName()).newInstance());
            } 
        } 
    }
    //è¿™æ˜¯å¯¹å¤–çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè®©å¤–éƒ¨ç¨‹åºä»å®¹å™¨ä¸­è·å–Beanå®ä¾‹ï¼Œä¼šé€æ­¥æ¼”åŒ–æˆæ ¸å¿ƒæ–¹æ³•
    public Object getBean(String beanName) {
        return singletons.get(beanName);
    }
}

public class XmlBeanDefinitionReader {

    public XmlBeanDefinitionReader(BeanFactory beanFactory) {

    public void loadBeanDefinitions(Resource resource) {
        while (resource.hasNext()) {
            Element element = (Element) resource.next();
            String beanID = element.attributeValue("id");
            String beanClassName = element.attributeValue("class");
            BeanDefinition beanDefinition = new BeanDefinition(beanID, beanClassName);
            this.beanFactory.registerBeanDefinition(beanDefinition);
        }
    }
}

public class SimpleBeanFactory implements BeanFactory{
    private List<BeanDefinition> beanDefinitions = new ArrayList<>();
    private List<String> beanNames = new ArrayList<>();
    private Map<String, Object> singletons = new HashMap<>();
    public SimpleBeanFactory() {
    }

    //getBeanï¼Œå®¹å™¨çš„æ ¸å¿ƒæ–¹æ³•
    public Object getBean(String beanName) throws BeansException {
        //å…ˆå°è¯•ç›´æ¥æ‹¿Beanå®ä¾‹
        Object singleton = singletons.get(beanName);
        //å¦‚æœæ­¤æ—¶è¿˜æ²¡æœ‰è¿™ä¸ªBeançš„å®ä¾‹ï¼Œåˆ™è·å–å®ƒçš„å®šä¹‰æ¥åˆ›å»ºå®ä¾‹
        if (singleton == null) {
            int i = beanNames.indexOf(beanName);
            if (i == -1) {
                throw new BeansException();
            }
            else {
                //è·å–Beançš„å®šä¹‰
                BeanDefinition beanDefinition = beanDefinitions.get(i);
                try {
                    singleton = Class.forName(beanDefinition.getClassName()).newInstance();
                } 
                //æ³¨å†ŒBeanå®ä¾‹
                singletons.put(beanDefinition.getId(), singleton);
            }
        }
        return singleton;
    }

    public void registerBeanDefinition(BeanDefinition beanDefinition) {
        this.beanDefinitions.add(beanDefinition);
        this.beanNames.add(beanDefinition.getId());
    }
}

public class ClassPathXmlApplicationContext implements BeanFactory{

    public ClassPathXmlApplicationContext(String fileName) {

    public Object getBean(String beanName) throws BeansException {

        this.beanFactory.registerBeanDefinition(beanDefinition);
    }
}
